name: Grave Fallers
description:
Your consciousness is haunting you and you don’t have much time until the realisation of reality hits you. Oh my, it’s gonna be painful. But don’t despair… we know how to deal with reality! We’re professionals! Just do whichever random thing you can, so you won’t think about it for a while. That’s always worked! Luckily, your father’s grave is open, and the hole is pretty deep. Jump in and run, maybe you can outrun your thoughts!

Just try to avoid all the other painful things on the way… those won’t help. You’re here to relax, not to deal with your problems. Those will only hold you back.

If you have company, try the two players mode - winning against someone in something totally meaningless will definitely help to ease your mind!

Controls:

  • Player 1 - A/D to move left/right, W (or space) to jump
  • Player 2 - Arrow left / right to move left/right, arrow up to jump

Controllers are also (hopefully) supported, first one controls the first character, second one the second character.
